compounddef.title: WHOS Describe Currently Defined Variables With Memory Usage

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Reports information on either all variables in the current context or on a specified set of variables. For each variable, the who function indicates the size and type of the variable as well as if it is a global or persistent. There are two formats for the function call. The first is the explicit form, in which a list of variables are provided: whos a1 a2 ... In the second form whos the whos function lists all variables defined in the current context (as well as global and persistent variables). Note that there are two alternate forms for calling the whos function: whos 'a1' 'a2' ... and whos('a1','a2',...)
